menu.title: Menu 'Fitness'
menu.descr: Menu 'Fitness' - a new approach to cooking: more fresh vegetables and fruits. A product for active and healthy people. This is a completely new product with an optimal price and high quality!

menu.title: Menu 'Lenten'
menu.descr: Menu 'Lenten' - a careful selection of ingredients: complete absence of animal products, milk from almonds, oats, coconut, or buckwheat, the right amount of proteins due to tofu and imported vegetarian steaks.

menu.title: Menu 'Premium'
menu.descr: In the 'Premium' menu, we use not only beautiful packaging design but also high-quality dish execution. Red fish, seafood, fruits - restaurant menu without going to the restaurant!
